app.lem:
La vision de Tondale
This title was assigned by modern critics
app.rdg: Tondale's Vision

app.lem: Seignurs ! ore m'escotez, qe dieu vous beneie !
app.rdg: Lords! Now listen to me; may God bless you!

app.lem: Vn' esture vous dirrai, ne vous mentray mie -
app.rdg: I will tell you a story and I will not lie at all

app.lem: Si com en latyn le trouai, bon est que ieo le vous die
app.rdg: - although I found it in Latin, it is good that I tell it to you

app.lem: En fraunceis pur lez vnes qi ne seiunnt de clergie -
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: De vn homme qi de la mort reueint a la vie,
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Et de penes d'enfern q'il suffri en partie ;
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Et les joies q'il vist ne mettrai en vbli.
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Tundale fu appelle, molt auoit seignurie ;
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: De grantz liu fu estrete, le corps out bien furnie,
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Mes lez faites out mauueis et plain de tiraundie ;
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Pur ceo suffrit il puis maint forte hacchie.
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Apres la passioun Ihesu li sire benure
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Mil aunz cent qaraunt et neef pleynement passe,
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Ffu Tundale en Hirland la ou il fust nee.
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Molt auoit le quor felouns et playa de mauueiste;
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: De salu de sa alme gers fu purpense,
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: De qai si homme luy parlast, le tient afolte;
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Seint' eglise ne poures ne ama ne charite ;
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: A jogolurs et mentours se fu trestot done
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Pur veine glorie conquere qi rien ad de bounte.
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Plusours auoit amys q'il tient en cherte,
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Et vn entre lez autres qi a luy fu oblige
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: En vn' dette de treis chivaux qi dust estre paie
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: A iour certein, mes adounk ne furent apreste,
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Et Tundal ad de luy la dette demaunde.
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Qant ne le pust auer dolent fust et irre ;
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Mes celi compaignon a manger l'ad prie
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Et de son grant rancour l'ad auques aswage.
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Vn' ache q'il porta pre de liu ad pose,
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -

app.lem: Si s'asit et auoit de manger comence
app.rdg: in French, for those who aren't clerics -
